MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G75 postcode area of East Kilbride. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.41pm. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:46PM on Thursday 25 March 2021.
